# generated by cmake-generator
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.16.3)

add_library(udp-server-connections STATIC 
  udp_server_connections.c
  unique_id.c)

include(Tornado.cmake)
set_tornado(udp-server-connections)

target_include_directories(udp-server-connections PUBLIC ../include)


target_link_libraries(udp-server-connections PUBLIC 
  udp-server
  datagram-transport
  udp-connections-serialize
  secure-random)
